Detailed Description

Contrained bottleneck assignment problem algorithm.

Implemenation of the contrained bottleneck assignment problem (CBAP) that's used as a lower bound for the contrained BTSP objective value.

NOTE: This code is an almost verbatim copy of C++ code written by Jonker (a copy may be found at http://www.magiclogic.com/assignment.html). The code will not compile along side Concorde, and requires a full cost matrix (which we need to avoid for large problems). Therefore, the best option was to implement a C version using our problem data structure.

This code is explained in the paper: "A Shortest Augmenting Path Algorithm for Dense and Sparse Linear Assignment Problems," Computing 38, 325-340, 1987 by R. Jonker and A. Volgenant, University of Amsterdam.

Author:
John LaRusic

Definition in file cbap.c.
